name: Kozeatis: The Fabric of Civilization
description:
Your party has entered the expansive and marvelous world of Kozeatis, a place so diverse in nature and culture that every side of it is a place almost entirely different from the one neighboring it.  

You can join the armies of Guang and Tong to become the greatest warrior the world has ever seen.  You can take up work as a farmer in the Mongian Republic. You can be the artist you always wanted to be in Palpia. 

Kozeatis is a world brimming with as much opportunity as there is conflict.

The world is vast and gives plenty of room for your party to fit its adventuring needs.

The myriad of nations gives all kinds of possibilities for quests and story arcs.  

Enjoy!
